root.name: Welcome Home! Chibi Robo!
root.description: Overview You can tell she's grown up because she's no longer a frog So far only available in Japan, Chibi-Robo follows the titular robot as he returns to the house of a now-adult Jenny Sanderson and earns money and happy points by vacuuming her house. A colorful cast of side characters can be expected as well, each with their own story and some minigames to complete.
